00002  * dcid_interface.h

00007  *
00008  * This API defines an interface for accessing the daughter card ID information.
00009  *
00010  * DCID := Daughter Card ID (this module)
00011  */

00020 #include <stdint.h>

00022 /*! \name forward declarations */
00023 /*! \{ */
00024 struct _dcid_info_t;
00025 struct _dcid_t;
00026 /*! \} */
00027 
00028 /*!
00029 
00030  Create an instance of the Daughter Card ID Interface.
00031 
00032   @param p_dcid_info (INP) - DCID Info used to initialize DCID instance
00033   @param pp_dcid (OUT) - Pointer to DCID instance
00034   @return DCID_OK for success, otherwise DCID_ error code
00035 
00036 */
00037 
00038 int dcid_create(struct _dcid_info_t *p_dcid_info, struct _dcid_t **pp_dcid);
00039 
00040 /*!
00041 
00042  Closes an instance of the Daughter Card ID Interface.
00043 
00044   @param p_dcid (INP) - DCID instance
00045   @return DCID_OK for success, otherwise DCID_ error code
00046 
00047  */
00048 
00049 int dcid_close(struct _dcid_t *p_dcid);
00050 
00051 /*!
00052 
00053  Initialize an instance of the Daughter Card ID Interface. Must be called before
00054  any other API calls, aside from dcid_create and dcid_close.
00055 
00056   @param p_dcid (INP) - DCID instance
00057   @param dcid_device_path (INP) - Path to proper device (e.g. "/dev/dcid")
00058   @return DCID_OK for success, otherwise DCID_ error code
00059 
00060  */
00061 
00062 int dcid_init(struct _dcid_t *p_dcid, char *dcid_device_path);
00063 
00064 /*!
00065 
00066  Read XML data from the Daughter Card ID Interface.
00067 
00068   @param p_dcid (INP) - DCID instance
00069   @param xml_data (OUT) - XML data in ASCII char encoding
00070   @param p_size (INP/OUT) - INP: Max size, in bytes, to write to xml_data buffer.
00071                             OUT: Returns number of bytes written (incl null terminator).
00072   @return DCID_OK for success, otherwise DCID_ error code
00073 
00074  */
00075 
00076 int dcid_read_xml(struct _dcid_t *p_dcid, char *xml_data, int *p_size);
00077 
00078 /*!
00079 
00080  Write XML data to the Daughter Card ID Interface.
00081 
00082   @param p_dcid (INP) - DCID instance
00083   @param xml_data (OUT) - XML data in ASCII char encoding
00084   @param p_size (INP/OUT) - INP: Max size, in bytes, to write to DCID.
00085                             OUT: Returns number of bytes written (does not write null terminator).
00086   @return DCID_OK for success, otherwise DCID_ error code
00087 
00088  */
00089 
00090 int dcid_write_xml(struct _dcid_t *p_dcid, char *xml_data, int *p_size);

00092 /*! 
00093 
00094   @brief DCID instance
00095 
00096   This structure represents an instance of the DCID.
00097 
00098 */
00099 
00100 typedef struct _dcid_t
00101 {
00102     /*! dcid device file handle */
00103     int device_file;
00104     /*! initialization flag */
00105     int is_initialized;
00106     /*! write cache, to prevent partial writes. value above 255 implies no cached value */
00107     uint16_t *write_cache;
00108 }
00109 dcid_t;
00110 
00111 /*! 
00112 
00113   @brief DCID information 
00114 
00115   This structure should be passed to dcid_create() in order to initialize
00116   a DCID instance. 
00117 
00118 */
00119 
00120 typedef struct _dcid_info_t
00121 {
00122     int dummy; /*!< temporary placeholder */
00123 }
00124 dcid_info_t;

00126 /*! \name DCID sizes, in bytes */
00127 /*! \{ */
00128 #define DCID_MAX_XML_SIZE        0x1000  /*!< 4096 bytes, @todo finalize this max */
00129 #define DCID_MAX_RAW_SIZE        0x0300  /*!< 768 bytes */
00130 /*! \} */
00131 
00132 /*! maximum address available for read/write from DCID */
00133 #define DCID_MAX_ADDRESS (DCID_MAX_RAW_SIZE-1)
00134 
00135 /*! \name DCID return codes */
00136 /*! \{ */
00137 #define DCID_OK                  0x0000  /*!< Success! */
00138 #define DCID_FAIL                0x0001  /*!< Generic failure */
00139 #define DCID_NOTIMPL             0x0002  /*!< Functionality not implemented */
00140 #define DCID_INVALID_PARAM       0x0003  /*!< Invalid parameter */
00141 #define DCID_OUT_OF_MEMORY       0x0004  /*!< Out of memory */
00142 #define DCID_ACCESS_DENIED       0x0005  /*!< Access denied */
00143 #define DCID_INVALID_CALL        0x0006  /*!< Invalid call */
00144 /*! \} */
00145 
00146 /*! \name DCID return code lookup table, for convienence */
00147 /*! \{ */
00148 char *DCID_RETURN_CODE_LOOKUP[0x07];
00149 /*! \} */
00150 
00151 /*! \name DCID return code helper functions */
00152 /*! \{ */
00153 /*! Detect success error code */
00154 #define DCID_SUCCESS(x) (x == DCID_OK)
00155 /*! Detect failure error code */
00156 #define DCID_FAILED(x) (x != DCID_OK)
00157 /*! \} */
00158 
00159 #ifdef __cplusplus
00160 }
00161 #endif
00162 
00163 #endif
